item.title: A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable
item.description:
A Clever Headrest That Could Make Flying Actually Bearable

There are many reasons to hate flying economy. The tiny seats, the inedible food, the fees airlines charge for things you'd get for free in a medieval dungeon. Manon KÃ¼hne can't fix any of that, but she's has found one small way to make sitting in 17C just a bit less hellish.

item.title: New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you
item.description:
New SpaceX landing photos make you feel like the rocket is coming down on top of you

Up until now, we've really only seen SpaceX's rocket landing in the middle of the ocean from afar. Chase planes near the drone ship provided a spectacular view of the milestone event, but now, S...
